name: Starbucks Copycat Lemon Loaf (Vegan)
description: If you like Starbucks Lemon Loaf, you will love this VEGAN copycat lemon loaf! This recipe is easy to make, loaded with lemon flavor and topped with a delicious lemon glaze.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F and lightly grease a standard loaf pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F and lightly grease a standard loaf pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all of the wet ingredients in a blender until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all of the wet ingredients in a blender until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together all the dry ingredients. Now pour the wet mixture into the dry and mix with a large spoon until just combined. Do not over mix.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, whisk together all the dry ingredients. Now pour the wet mixture into the dry and mix with a large spoon until just combined. Do not over mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into the prepared pan and bake for 35-45 minutes, until golden brown and a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Let the loaf cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then move to a cooling rack.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into the prepared pan and bake for 35-45 minutes, until golden brown and a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Let the loaf cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then move to a cooling rack.

recipeInstructions.text: While the loaf cools, add the icing ingredients to a medium sized bowl and whisk until smooth. Once the loaf is cooled, drizzle or pour the glaze on top of the loaf. Let the glaze harden, if desired, before slicing and serving. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: While the loaf cools, add the icing ingredients to a medium sized bowl and whisk until smooth. Once the loaf is cooled, drizzle or pour the glaze on top of the loaf. Let the glaze harden, if desired, before slicing and serving. Enjoy!

keywords: lemon cake, lemon loaf, vegan loaf recipe
